home.title: Sucré Salé | French Bakery Cozumel
home.desc: We are a French family restaurant with a wide repertoire of desserts and delicious dishes
home.T4: Our café seeks to give you an unparalleled experience. Between flavors and colors, Sucré-Salé's goal is for all customers to feel satisfied and happy by enjoying our wide and varied French menu. We are happy to give you the necessary attention and satisfaction.
home.T5: Quality Food with a Homely Touch
home.T6: Calle 2 Nte. 101b, Centro, 77600 San Miguel de Cozumel, Q.R.  |  +52 987 115 59 68

menu.title: Menu | Sucré Salé | French Bakery Cozumel
menu.desc: Taste our wide repertoire of French and Mexican desserts and delicious dishes
menu.M2a: Quality Food with a Homely Touch
menu.M2b: With a French touch and a touch of love we managed to bring a little piece of France to your palate. Have a unique experience and dare to try our delicacies.

breakfast.title: Breakfast
breakfast.T3: 3 eggs any style, salad, potatoes and bacon, baguette, butter, jam and coffee or orange juice.
breakfast.T5: 2 eggs any style, chilaquiles, beans, home made bread, jam and coffee or orange juice.
breakfast.T14: French toast, strawberries, organic honey and banana.

special.title: Specialities
special.T4: Toasted ham and cheese sandwich with tomato, topped with a fried egg.
special.T6: Puff pastry, tomato, grouyere cheese and roquefort.
special.T8: Puff pastry, salmon, goat cheese and spinach.
special.T12: Mushroom, tomatoes, onions, spinach and chesse.
special.T14: Mushroom, onions, tomatoe sauce and vegan sausage made of beetroot, wheat, corn and potato.
special.T18: Pulled pork, onions and avocado cream.

bread.title: Artesanal Bread
bread.T10: Milk bread in form of a braid.
bread.T12: Delicious Brioche in form of a muffin.
bread.T16: Little milk bread perfect for a cop of coffee.
bread.T24: Cake Fruit de la Passion et Banane

contact.T2: Please leave any suggestions or feedback, it is always very welcome. We are excited to hear from you!
